title: weird lag?
body:
this morning i started playing lol as the usual, until i noticed that my fps was a bit odd. on vsync it was locked on 53 fps (when my pc settings say that my screen is on 60 hz). the game was playing faster and out of nowhere it started going very slow. i cant really describe it.its like playing in slow motion.(unplayable).when i cranked my screen up to 75 hz my ingame vsync would be around 66 fps( and i still had the same problems). even if i put vsync off it will do the same.
pls help me {{item:3070}} 


(ive overclocked my cpu, may that have something to do with this?)


~darek

replies.body:
This may not be a lag issue, but an FPS one.  Meaning that a bad driver or game file could be dropping your frame rate and not your network connection.  You can always run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) just in case to be sure.

My suggestion for your specific issue is to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your pc settings are tuned up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Are you in nv and do you use charter?
